scenes.background: Monica looks stressed, tapping her pen on the table.
scenes.description: We can't afford another delay. We need to move forward!

options.text: I understand the urgency, but rushing might lead to mistakes.
options.analysis: You acknowledged the urgency but cautioned against rushing, showing good emotional perception and a balanced approach.

options.text: Let's make sure everyone knows their tasks well to avoid any errors.
options.analysis: You emphasized clarity and preparation, showing a balanced emotional response and good social skills.

options.text: I agree, we need to act quickly, but let's review our plan one more time.
options.analysis: You agreed on the need for quick action but suggested a final review, showing strong self-regulation and motivation.
